task.title: Auto-delete Log Files -Windows
task.shortdesc: Agents can set a scheduler to auto-delete recording log files in a defined range of days, for example 30 days.

taskbody.context:
This section covers the steps to schedule auto-delete recording log files from an Agent's machine.
Refer to the steps for Windows task scheduler:

step.cmd: Locate the log folder on machine.
Open Notepad to create a Batch Script.
In Notepad, paste the following information:
Save it as delete_obs_logs.bat (make sure it's .bat not .txt).
Open Task Scheduler (Win + R, type taskschd.msc, and hit Enter).
Click Create Basic Task → Name it Delete OBS Logs
Choose Action → "Start a Program" → Browse and select delete_obs_logs.bat.

step.stepresult: The auto-delete task gets scheduled in an Agent's machine.
